alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:39PM CDT until May 07 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in southwestern Iowa... Southeastern Pottawattamie County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Hastings, or 14 miles west of Red Oak, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 728 PM, quarter sized hail was reported near Malvern. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elliott and Grant. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
